tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmergencyResponseTeam (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  contact_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE nuclear_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type VARCHAR(255),
  incident_description TEXT,
  incident_location VARCHAR(255),
  radiation_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE evacuation_guidelines (
  guideline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  evacuation_zone INT,
  instructions TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES nuclear_incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NuclearIncidents (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  incident_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  location TEXT,
  radiation_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE RadiationLevels (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  measurement_id INT NOT NULL,
  measurement_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  radiation_reading FLOAT NOT NULL,
  sensor_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EvacuationGuidelines (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT NOT NULL,
  evacuation_order TEXT NOT NULL,
  evacuation_zone INT,
  safety_instructions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Nuclear_Incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Radiation_Levels (
  level_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date_time DATETIME,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Evacuation_Guidelines (
  guideline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  instructions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Emergency_Response_Teams (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)
